description: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires the services of a Contractor to gather and organize information from relevant target audiences, the Canadian Student Financial Assistance program, and provinces/territories...
full_summary:
============================================

###  Request for Proposal (RFP) for Integrated Federal-Provincial-Territorial Student Financial Assistance Estimator

#### Tender Name: [ Identification of Business and End User Engagement Requirements for F-P/T Student Financial Assistance Estimator ]

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a contractor to provide services to gather and organize information from relevant target audiences, the Canadian Student Financial Assistance program, and provinces/territories to aid in identifying end-user engagement and business requirements for the development, implementation, and ongoing maintenance of an integrated Federal-Provincial-Territorial Student Financial Assistance estimator.

The proposed project will require the contractor to:

* Develop a comprehensive report containing recommendations and next steps for the development of the estimator.
* Identify key stakeholder requirements, engaging them throughout the development process.
* Gather and organize relevant information from target audiences.

The successful contractor will possess expertise in business administration services and have a proven track record in similar projects.

#### Procurement Details

* Solicitation number: 100023868/B
* Closing date: April 17, 2024, 2:00:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* Solicitation deadline: April 17, 2024, 2:00:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* Contract duration: Not specified

The Canadian government has favorable agreements with several countries, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

#### Contact Information

Joshua De Sousa
Procurement Specialist
Phone: (343) 543-8997
Email: [NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)

Note: Please note that 400 words is not long enough to accommodate all the information provided. We have mainly focused on the project details and procurement procedure.
